meta.title: Operation of Stainless Steel Mixing Tank

sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for the operation of Stainless Steel Mixing Tank for liquid preparation.
sections.scope: Applicable to liquid manufacturing activities carried out in the Pharmaceutics.
procedure: Verify that the tank is clean and valves are properly closed.
Fill the tank with the required volume of solvent/water.
Start the agitator and set the desired speed.
Add ingredients as per the manufacturing instructions.
Maintain mixing until a homogeneous solution is achieved.
Check pH and other parameters as required.
Discharge the liquid through the bottom outlet for further processing.
Clean the tank and stirrer immediately after use.
Sanitize with appropriate agents if required.
Document batch details and mixing parameters in the logbook.
precautions: Do not exceed the maximum working volume of the tank.
Ensure the agitator is stopped before opening the manhole/lid.
Check for leaks at valves and gaskets before starting.
Follow validated cleaning SOPs for product changeover.
Use appropriate PPE during ingredient charging.
